document_data.name: Mumps
document_data.mainbody: '''Mumps''' was a mundane infectious [[disease]], found in the [[Shining South]]'s [[hin]] nation of [[Luiren]].
document_data.Treatment: Halflings of Luiren learned a special skill of medicinal cooking that involved making curative foods using [[Luiren spring cheese]]. Apprentice cooks knew how to prepare meals that could cure many normal diseases, including mumps.
